name: bridge-table-scraper
description: Scrapes bridge tournament tables and serves them via Express

scripts.postinstall: apt-get update && apt-get install -y wget gnupg && wget -q -O - https://dl.google.com/linux/linux_signing_key.pub | apt-key add - && echo 'deb [arch=amd64] http://dl.google.com/linux/chrome/deb/ stable main' >> /etc/apt/sources.list.d/google-chrome.list && apt-get update && apt-get install -y google-chrome-stable
